Articles.Content:
Hey People

I was taking a look at the KSP weekly and in the editos notes there was this link http://www.kerbalmaps.com/

In the Top right if you toggle Space Centres There is a 3rd Space Centre Area

WHAT!!

Anybody been there? pics? i never even new it was there. ha!
thats the Second KSC, thats been there for a while.. the other 2 are the original one and the island runway.
Isn't there another one just like it which is much closer to the actual KSC?
